alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Onondaga; Southern Cayuga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 5:21PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Madison, eastern Cayuga, Cortland, Onondaga and northwestern Chenango Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 521 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jordan to near McGraw. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Onondaga, Syracuse, De Witt, Cortland, Sullivan, Pompey, Solvay, Chittenango, Manlius and Fayetteville. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 34A and 36. New York Interstate 81 between 10 and 25A. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York.

area.areaDesc: Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Onondaga; Southern Cayuga
